item.title: Prettify your flickr stream with «I Hardly Knew Her»
item.description: I have to say, I think this alternative flickr interface is just great. It gives focus to the photos, while providing exactly enough metadata (hint: click the picture to view large version). I've linked up my flickr stream here, to see your own, just change the username in the url.
